snippet: Exploiting China’s vast resources of shale gas is the only short-term way for the country to avoid huge increases in greenhouse gas emissions from burning coal.
abstract: Op-Ed article by climate change expert Elizabeth Muller calls on China to exploit its vast resources of shale gas, saying it is only short-term way for country to avoid huge increases in greenhouse gas emissions from burning coal; cautions that unregulated hydraulic fracturing could present its own environmental dangers.
lead_paragraph: Exploiting China’s vast resources of shale gas is the only short-term way for the country to avoid huge increases in greenhouse gas emissions from burning coal.

headline.main: China Must Exploit Its Shale Gas
headline.print_headline: China Must Exploit Its Shale Gas
